title: UmerIdrees
author: UmerIdrees
content: These days with high speed and cheap internet, IPTV is the best way to watch TV instead of Cable, HD box,  Dish or Satellite receivers, etc.Do you know anyone offering good cheap IPTV ?  Also if there are any free IPTV services, do let me know about them too. Obviously, the payment should be in bitcoin and not in fiat money.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: If you are looking for a large number of channels at a low price and if you are not too demanding about their quality, then IPTV is a service that will satisfy you. All IPTVs offered through the forum are in Goods -> Digital goods (Invites & Accounts) and as far as I've seen, they all accept BTC - and if you want to find more, I suggest you use the keywords IPTV - Bitcoin on any search engine.Of course, a test for at least 24 hours is mandatory, and it is best to test at the weekend, when most people are watching TV, and thus the servers are under the greatest load. From personal experience, I had a service that worked almost perfectly every day except for weekends when it was practically unusable.

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: Cheap is very reliative thing. What is cheap for me might be expensive for you. How much you are ready to pay for IPTV service? There is some IPTV service providers here on Bitcointalk, I think their prices start from $10 monthly. Though, I haven't tried none of them because I already have provider which works fine for me and it's cheaper. You should try yourself how it will workf for you by taking free test, most providers offer it.Free IPTV - forget it. One day it might work well, but it can stop working at any moment. And you don't want that it would happen on most interesting part of game.

comments.author: mirakal
comments.body: I am currently subscribed to this IPTV service, please check the thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1452484.msg61124053#msg61124053I paid one year subscription for 2 accounts, so far, so good my friend. By the way, I'm using my smart tv to watch live channels and movies, just a tip, it's better if the connection is wired because I tried using my wifi and it freeze sometimes, I'm thinking it was the IPTV but it was the interference from the wifi.

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: UmerIdrees on October 15, 2022, 09:29:40 AMThese days with high speed and cheap internet, IPTV is the best way to watch TV instead of Cable, HD box,  Dish or Satellite receivers, etc.Do you know anyone offering good cheap IPTV ?  Also if there are any free IPTV services, do let me know about them too. Obviously, the payment should be in bitcoin and not in fiat money.I saw that you have tested and reviewed well an IPTV service here http://Re: Cheap Cable? How about Free IPTV?. So if you were satisfied with their free trail, you can buy their subscriptions instead of looking for another one.Also, note that no IPTV or any other online service is free. Where you will find the free service, there will be no guarantee for the quality and durability of the service. As always said, for all the free services, YOU are the product.

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: LTU_btc on October 15, 2022, 10:57:04 PMCheap is very reliative thing. What is cheap for me might be expensive for you. How much you are ready to pay for IPTV service? There is some IPTV service providers here on Bitcointalk, I think their prices start from $10 monthly. $10 monthly is not what I am willing to pay only for an IPTV. Paying 10$ for IPTV is not cheap at least in my country. Better i would stick to my cable TV where i pay 1.75$ a month or maybe use an HD box with it and it cost total 3$ a month.Quote from: noormcs5 on October 16, 2022, 03:57:35 AMQuote from: UmerIdrees on October 15, 2022, 09:29:40 AMThese days with high speed and cheap internet, IPTV is the best way to watch TV instead of Cable, HD box,  Dish or Satellite receivers, etc.Do you know anyone offering good cheap IPTV ?  Also if there are any free IPTV services, do let me know about them too. Obviously, the payment should be in bitcoin and not in fiat money.I saw that you have tested and reviewed well an IPTV service here http://Re: Cheap Cable? How about Free IPTV?. So if you were satisfied with their free trail, you can buy their subscriptions instead of looking for another one.Also, note that no IPTV or any other online service is free. Where you will find the free service, there will be no guarantee for the quality and durability of the service. As always said, for all the free services, YOU are the product.Yes, I tested and reviewed that the service was reasonable but again the price factor was not so attractive to me. Maybe I won't get anything cheaper than this   Or maybe i need to find an IPTV service provider in my local city, in order to get some cheap rates.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.created_time: October 19, 2022, 07:42:56 AMLast edit: October 19, 2022, 07:52:59 AM by Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: UmerIdrees on October 18, 2022, 09:50:41 PM$10 monthly is not what I am willing to pay only for an IPTV. Paying 10$ for IPTV is not cheap at least in my country. Better i would stick to my cable TV where i pay 1.75$ a month or maybe use an HD box with it and it cost total 3$ a month.If you plan to pay IPTV subscription each month, then I don't think that you will find much cheaper service than that. Those IPTV providers usually offer big discount if you are paying for a whole year in advance and then it ends up cheaper. I do know that it is a much bigger risk as service can stop at any time, but all people I know that have one of these illegal IPTVs are using it this way to reduce the cost.Quote from: UmerIdrees on October 18, 2022, 09:50:41 PM Or maybe i need to find an IPTV service provider in my local city, in order to get some cheap rates.Cheap and good usually don't go together. What's the point of saving 2 or 3 dollars a month if service will be bad and you won't be able to watch anything on weekends when there's a lot of traffic.

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: Quote from: UmerIdrees on October 18, 2022, 09:50:41 PM$10 monthly is not what I am willing to pay only for an IPTV. Paying 10$ for IPTV is not cheap at least in my country. Better i would stick to my cable TV where i pay 1.75$ a month or maybe use an HD box with it and it cost total 3$ a month.I understand you perfectly. $10 is almost same price like cable TV, legal streaming platforms or Netflix costs in my country. So, I'm also not very fascinated about idea to pay such price for illegal IPTV.Most of these IPTV'S for $10 offer something like 10 000 - 15 000 channels, but you really need that much? 90% of these channels will be in language that you won't understand and most likely that you will watch just small % of these channels.I suggest you to look for more localised providers which will cost cheaper. It will have less channels, but these channels will be that you actually need. For example, now I use IPTV which costs $3, have about 2000 channels, and yeah, I'm paying in Bitcoin.

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: LTU_btc on October 19, 2022, 08:37:16 PMQuote from: UmerIdrees on October 18, 2022, 09:50:41 PM$10 monthly is not what I am willing to pay only for an IPTV. Paying 10$ for IPTV is not cheap at least in my country. Better i would stick to my cable TV where i pay 1.75$ a month or maybe use an HD box with it and it cost total 3$ a month.I understand you perfectly. $10 is almost same price like cable TV, legal streaming platforms or Netflix costs in my country. So, I'm also not very fascinated about idea to pay such price for illegal IPTV.First of all, why are you using the work illegal with IPTV ?Is IPTV illegal in general or the one which you are using is illegal? Quote from: LTU_btc on October 19, 2022, 08:37:16 PMMost of these IPTV'S for $10 offer something like 10 000 - 15 000 channels, but you really need that much? 90% of these channels will be in language that you won't understand and most likely that you will watch just small % of these channels.I suggest you to look for more localised providers which will cost cheaper. It will have less channels, but these channels will be that you actually need. For example, now I use IPTV which costs $3, have about 2000 channels, and yeah, I'm paying in Bitcoin.I agree but still IPTV offer channels which you will not find elsewhere. For example, no sports channel or cable operator in my country show the cricket series "IPL". But with IPTV, i can watch those channels where IPL is live broad cast.Your IPTV costs only 3$. May i know which IPTV is that and do they offer services globally ? Maybe they have the channels which i am wiling to see ?

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: UmerIdrees on October 20, 2022, 02:12:00 PMFirst of all, why are you using the work illegal with IPTV ?Is IPTV illegal in general or the one which you are using is illegal? IPTV is not an illegal way of distributing media content, but it is illegal if the person who delivers the service does not pay copyrights, taxes or has any broadcasting license. All these services that you can find online (including the forum) are of course illegal, but torrents are also illegal, as is pirated software.People use illegal IPTV because they think that nothing bad can happen to them, which is mostly true - those who are sometimes caught are mostly the providers of these services.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on October 20, 2022, 04:03:14 PMQuote from: UmerIdrees on October 20, 2022, 02:12:00 PMFirst of all, why are you using the work illegal with IPTV ?Is IPTV illegal in general or the one which you are using is illegal? IPTV is not an illegal way of distributing media content, but it is illegal if the person who delivers the service does not pay copyrights, taxes or has any broadcasting license. All these services that you can find online (including the forum) are of course illegal, but torrents are also illegal, as is pirated software.People use illegal IPTV because they think that nothing bad can happen to them, which is mostly true - those who are sometimes caught are mostly the providers of these services.For sure, IPTVs are illegal as there is no way one can give you thousands of channels only for few bucks. Secondly these IPTVs contain premium channels too which themselves cost some dollars but they are included in the package already.OP, you need to focus on getting quality of the streaming IPTV with working channels as i know some IPTV services which are useless as most channels will never load and sometimes you will face buffering issues. You may get a cheap IPTV but sooner or later you will realize you are getting nothing from the provider.

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: Quote from: UmerIdrees on October 20, 2022, 02:12:00 PMFirst of all, why are you using the work illegal with IPTV ?Is IPTV illegal in general or the one which you are using is illegal? In general, most of IPTV services is illegal because of copyrights and everything what's related to it. There is simply no legal way to get thousands of TV channels from all world for something like 10$.I'm subscribed to 2 OTT services, but they don't have everything what I need, so I also have to use illegal IOTV to watch channels like ESPN or Sky Sports.QuoteI agree but still IPTV offer channels which you will not find elsewhere. For example, no sports channel or cable operator in my country show the cricket series "IPL". But with IPTV, i can watch those channels where IPL is live broad cast.Your IPTV costs only 3$. May i know which IPTV is that and do they offer services globally ? Maybe they have the channels which i am wiling to see ?I have no idea about cricket, I see that my service have channels like Sky Sports Cricket and Supersport Cricket, but I'm not sure that they show tournament that you need.Service is called Sharavoz.tk, but as I said, it's more like local service which mainly have Eastern European channels, though they have some main UK and US channels, including sports.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: LTU_btc on October 19, 2022, 08:37:16 PMI understand you perfectly. $10 is almost same price like cable TV, legal streaming platforms or Netflix costs in my country. So, I'm also not very fascinated about idea to pay such price for illegal IPTV. I don't know how it is in your country, but over here if you want to watch legally top football leagues, champions league, NBA, F1 and few other sports related channels you would have to spend ~50 dollars per month as all that is scattered across several providers. So yeah, IPTV for 5-6 dollars per month (if you take yearly sub) or even $10 is not such a bad deal anymore. Quote from: LTU_btc on October 19, 2022, 08:37:16 PMMost of these IPTV'S for $10 offer something like 10 000 - 15 000 channels, but you really need that much? 90% of these channels will be in language that you won't understand and most likely that you will watch just small % of these channels. That's probably more of a marketing stunt, IPTV service providers showing off with the huge amount of channels they have to impress potential customers. Quote from: LTU_btc on October 19, 2022, 08:37:16 PMI suggest you to look for more localised providers which will cost cheaper. It will have less channels, but these channels will be that you actually need. For example, now I use IPTV which costs $3, have about 2000 channels, and yeah, I'm paying in Bitcoin.Yeah, localised providers tend to be the best and were the ones I usually used.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: LTU_btc on October 20, 2022, 07:57:18 PMI have no idea about cricket, I see that my service have channels like Sky Sports Cricket and Supersport Cricket, but I'm not sure that they show tournament that you need.Service is called Sharavoz.tk, but as I said, it's more like local service which mainly have Eastern European channels, though they have some main UK and US channels, including sports.I have checked the site and found that Sharavoz.tk also provides 24 hrs free trail. Also, almost all of the IPTV series will provide him with a free trial so that he (OP) can check if the service is good and contains the channel that he wants to watch.The real reason of IPTV growth is that it is the cheapest service to watch any channel while others would cost a lot bigger amount. Another thing is that you have the least chance to get caught on using IPTV.

comments.author: negancoin
comments.body: Quote from: UmerIdrees on October 15, 2022, 09:29:40 AMDo you know anyone offering good cheap IPTV ?  Also if there are any free IPTV services.There are some free IPTV services that you can find on some forums. However, they don't last more than a day or two, a month if you're lucky. I can only vouch for Xtreme HD IPTV which I've been using for the last three years, it comes with over 20000 Channels ( All Major Sports Packages & PPV ) and costs $11 if you paid yearly. It doesn't matter where you from, their service is international. No free trial though ( $3/ 36 Hours Trial ).

comments.author: Maslate
comments.body: Quote from: negancoin on October 25, 2022, 09:00:39 AMQuote from: UmerIdrees on October 15, 2022, 09:29:40 AMDo you know anyone offering good cheap IPTV ?  Also if there are any free IPTV services.There are some free IPTV services that you can find on some forums. However, they don't last more than a day or two, a month if you're lucky. I can only vouch for Xtreme HD IPTV which I've been using for the last three years, it comes with over 20000 Channels ( All Major Sports Packages & PPV ) and costs $11 if you paid yearly. It doesn't matter where you from, their service is international. No free trial though ( $3/ 36 Hours Trial ). $11 usd per year or monthly? I think that's too cheap for a yearly subscription if it's a yearly.
